metadata.title: CVE-2014-8184 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in liblouis, versions 2.5.x before 2.5.4. Astack-based buffer overflow was found in findTable() in liblouis. Anattacker could create a malicious file that would cause applications thatuse liblouis (such as Orca) to crash, or potentially execute arbitrary codewhen opened.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8184` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.2
liblouis-data - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.2
liblouis2 - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.2
python-louis - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.2
python3-louis - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.3-2ubuntu1.2').
